sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Our Journey Through the Lens
sections.name: About,
sections.label: About Us
sections.content:
At Captured Moments Gallery, we believe in the power of photography to capture emotions and create lasting memories. Established in 2010, our team of expert photographers specializes in various genres like landscape, portrait, and event photography. Our mission is to tell stories through visually stunning images that leave a lasting impact.  
![Team Photo](https://example.com/about-image.jpg)

images.name: Photographer John Doe
images.description: John Doe capturing the perfect sunset shot with his camera.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Turning Moments into Art
sections.name: Services,
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
Explore the services that make your memories timeless:  
- **Wedding Photography**: Capture the essence of your special day.  
- **Portrait Photography**: Individual or family portraits crafted with care.  
- **Event Photography**: From corporate events to personal celebrations.  
- **Custom Shoots**: Tailored sessions to fit unique themes and ideas.  
![Service Sample](https://example.com/service-image.jpg)

images.name: Wedding Ceremony
images.description: A breathtaking shot of a couple exchanging vows.
